title: Overshadowed Hope
description: Life is a struggle for Missy Highwater, a twenty-four year old private school teacher. She struggles with her class room full of students who don’t respect her. Her fifteen year old pregnant sister has strained Missy’s relationship with her mother, and her grandfather just received a diagnosis of Alzheimer’s disease. Life is crashing down around Missy like a pile of bricks and her biggest struggle of all is her eating disorder. Take a trip with Missy as she tries to navigate through the labyrinth that is her family and tries to find the strength to overcome it all.
author: Becca Lee Nyx
